meanings.sent1: The school board decided to implement new policies every two bienniums.
meanings.sent2: The company's financial reports are analyzed every bienniums to track progress.
meanings.sent3: It felt like the bienniums passed by in the blink of an eye.
meanings.sent4: The bienniums stretched out ahead of them like a long road.
meanings.sent5: The changing seasons marked the passing of the bienniums.

meanings.definition: The plural form of biennium, meaning a two-year period.
meanings.sent1: The archaeologists unearthed artifacts from different bienniums.
meanings.sent2: Historians study various bienniums to understand past civilizations.
meanings.sent3: The museum displayed paintings from different bienniums side by side.
meanings.sent4: The bienniums of prosperity contrasted with the years of hardship.
meanings.sent5: The bienniums of peace were followed by times of conflict.
